description: The blue chair is directly to the left of the desk, and the plant is sitting on top of it.
The clock is mounted on the wall above the whiteboard, and the chair is beneath it.
The red ball is on the ground, and the green ball is placed above it on the shelf.
The car is parked on the left side of the street, and the tree is to the right of the car.
The lamp is to the right of the couch, while the TV is located directly across from the couch.
The bicycle is leaning against the tree, and the helmet is placed on top of the bicycle seat.
The orange vase is located in the corner of the room, and a large sofa is placed in front of it.
There is a sign on the door indicating ‘Welcome’ and a mat placed directly in front of it.
There is a stack of books on the left side of the desk, and a cup of tea is placed next to them.
The lamp is located on the far side of the table, and the book is resting on the near side.
The desk measures 1.5 meters in length, and the chair is positioned 0.8 meters from the desk.
The refrigerator stands 1.8 meters tall, and the counter is 2.5 meters wide.
The shelf is 2 meters long, and the books occupy 1.2 meters of it.
The green ball has a diameter of 15 cm, and the red ball has a diameter of 10 cm.
The painting on the wall measures 1.2 meters by 0.8 meters.
The length of the sofa is 2.3 meters, and the width of the rug is 1.5 meters.
The blue pillow is 40 cm wide, and the red pillow is 35 cm wide.
The kitchen table is 1 meter away from the window, and the sink is 1.5 meters from the table.
The bookshelf is 1.8 meters tall, and the top shelf is positioned 1.5 meters off the ground.
The door is 2 meters wide, and the mat in front of it is 1 meter long.
